text: Julian Peter Gölles (born September 22, 1999) is an Austrian football player. He plays as defender for the Austrian Bundesliga team FC Blau-Weiß Linz. ==Career == Gölles started his career at USV Vasoldsberg. In 2009 he moved to the youth team of SK Sturm Graz. In 2014 he went to the FC Red Bull Salzburg academy. In October 2016 he made his debut for FC Liefering in the second division. He was in the starting line-up against Kapfenberger SV on matchday 15 of the 2016/17 season. FC Salzburg Wiki In July 2018 he moved to league rivals SC Wiener Neustadt. After Wiener Neustadt's relegation, he moved to Bundesliga club WSG Tirol for the 2019/20 season. WSG Tirol In two years at WSG he made 24 appearances in the Bundesliga. After the 2020/21 seasonhe moved to the second division club FC Blau-Weiß Linz. ==International == Gölles played for an Austrian youth national team for the first time in September 2014. In March 2018 he played his only game for the U-19 team against Scotland. In October 2019 he made his debut for the U-21 team against Turkey. ==References == Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian footballers Category:FC Liefering players Category:Association football defenders Category:Austrian football defenders
title: Julian Gölles
